name: CrewAI Research & Write Workflow
description: A test workflow demonstrating CrewAI agents working together to research a topic and write a report

config.text: Research the latest AI trends in 2025 and write a comprehensive report

config.task: Research the latest AI trends in 2025 and write a comprehensive report

agents.goal: Research the topic thoroughly and gather comprehensive information
agents.backstory: You are an expert researcher with 10 years of experience in technology and AI. You excel at finding accurate, up-to-date information and synthesizing complex topics.

agents.goal: Write a clear, comprehensive, and well-structured report based on research findings
agents.backstory: You are a skilled technical writer who creates engaging, informative content. You excel at organizing information logically and presenting it in an accessible way.

tasks.description: Research the latest AI trends in 2025, including key developments, breakthroughs, and industry impacts
Write a comprehensive report based on the research findings, including an executive summary, key trends, and future outlook
